subtitleNullable: This dataset is specially for Beginners to do some classification task.
descriptionNullable:
### Context
This dataset contains almost 1000 news title, news_articles descriptions, publish time, publish date, number of views from February 01, 2021 to April  08, 2021 collected from the tribune news papers.

### Content
“The Tribune” which is popular local English news website (https://www.tribuneindia.com/) of Punjab state and New Delhi.

****article_id**:   has generated article id's.
**title**:   headline of the article.
**articles_desc**:   detail description of about news articles headline
**publish_date**:   date of the news article
**n_views**: number of views of the news articles 
**publish_time**:   time of the news articles
**is_popular**:  is articles is popular or not represented as 1 (popular) and 0 (not popular)
**

### Acknowledgements

This dataset was collected from https://www.tribuneindia.com/
title: The Tribune News Articles
